headline: FINCRAFT GROUP LLP NOMINATES EXPERIENCED DIRECTOR TO BOARD OF TETHYS PETROLEUM LIMITED
summary: Fincraft Group LLP ("Fincraft"), one of the largest shareholders of Tethys Petroleum Limited ("Tethys"), holding approximately 26.95% of the company, announced that it has submitted an amendment to the proposed resolutions to be considered at the annual general meeting (the "Meeting") of the shareholders to be held on August 11, 2025. The amendment proposes Mr. Askar Ismailov, President Advisor of Fincraft, for nomination as a director of Tethys.

The amendment proposes Mr. Askar Ismailov, President Advisor of Fincraft, for nomination as a director of Tethys.

headline: ConocoPhillips (COP) Reports Q2 Earnings Drop, Reaffirms 2025 Production and Dividend
summary: ConocoPhillips (COP) reported mixed financial results for the second quarter of 2025, showing growth in sales and revenue but a drop in net income and earnings per share. Despite the mixed earnings, the company's share price increased by 5% over the last quarter, aligning with broader market trends where major indexes also posted gains. A stable production guidance and a declared dividend supported shareholder confidence. These factors, along with recent strategic partnerships and asset sales...

headline: ConocoPhillips Produces Lower FCF and Investors are Bored - But is COP Stock Too Cheap?
summary: ConocoPhillips produced lower FCF, and investors seemed bored with the company, despite claims that it would boost free cash flow. Nevertheless, COP stock still looks too cheap here, based on its historical yield metrics.

headline: Gold Reserve Provides Update on Responses to Objections to the Special Master’s Final Recommendation in the CITGO Sale Process
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, August 08, 2025--Gold Reserve Ltd. (TSX.V: GRZ) (BSX: GRZ.BH) (OTCQX: GDRZF) ("Gold Reserve" or the "Company") announces that, pursuant to the schedule set by the U.S. District Court for the District of Delaware (the "Court"), various parties filed memoranda and statements in response to the objections to the Special Master’s Final Recommendation that Gold Reserve’s U.S. acquisition subsidiary, Dalinar Energy Corporation, should be selected by the Court to purchase the shares

headline: Raymond James Lifted PT on ConocoPhillips (COP) Stock
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is one of the Most Undervalued Long Term Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 22, Raymond James lifted the price objective on the company’s stock to $117 from $109, while keeping an “Outperform” rating, as reported by The Fly.
